name: Funtoon's World
developer: Yash Future Tech Solutions Pvt Ltd
publisher: Yash Future Tech Solutions Pvt Ltd
description: Funtoon's World is amazing adventurous game with 25 Levels. Get Ready to enter Funtoon's World with amazing Excitement in each Level. Get Ready to face different monsters and earn as much coins as you can to get highest score.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 or later required Processor: Intel Core i3 515 7U Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: 512 MB AMD or NVIDIA Graphic Card DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 500 MB available space
